elements.title: In pairs, classify the four cases correctly.

elements.name: Frage 1
elements.title: 16-year-old Petar, a trainee car mechatronics technician, would like to buy a second-hand moped for CHF 300. His parents do not agree. Petar has savings of CHF 2000.
choices: Little experience + few consequences = controversial judgment
Great experience + great consequences = controversial judgment
Little experience + major consequences = not capable of judgment
extensive experience + minor consequences = capable of judgment + sufficient financial means = contract is legally valid
extensive experience + minor consequences = capable of judgment, but insufficient financial means = contract is not legally valid
elements.correctAnswer: extensive experience + minor consequences = capable of judgment + sufficient financial means = contract is legally valid
